_comment0: DEBUG             | Supported levels: [NONE, LOG_ONLY, ERROR, WARNING, CRUCIAL, INFO]
_comment1: SCREEN RESOLUTION | window_resolution irrelevant unless fullscreen is true; fullscreen overwride window_resolution to monitor resolution; windowed false will overwrite fullscreen to true
_comment2: SCREEN FPS        | setting max_fps to 0 disables the fps cap; vsync will overwride max_fps to match window fps to monitor fps
_comment3: MOUSE AND CURSOR  | raw_mouse_input will enable raw mouse movement (bypass windows mouse acceleration)
